original: 吳郡吳縣人，東吳官員，陸凱之子。曾為黃門侍郎，後出任偏將軍。陸凱死後又被調回朝中為太子中庶子。右國史華覈曾盛讚陸禕，稱其統帥之才勝於魯肅。
text: A native of Wu County, Wu County, an official of Soochow Wu, son of Lu Kai. Once served as Huangmen minister, later served as general general. After Lu Kai died, he was transferred back to the central government as the prince's concubine. Youguo Shi Huahe once praised Lu Yi, saying that his commander-in-chief is better than Lu Su.
